description.value: A CodeSystem that identifies an error or warning codes in response to a request

purpose.value: A CodeSystem that identifies an error or warning codes in response to a request

definition.value: Not applicable to prescribing systems Note. The Spine will not reject a prescription for a dead patient however the requirement to check PDS for death status before prescribing prevents this scenario occurring.
The System must create a new prescription UUID and re-submit the prescription to the Spine.
The System must create and apply a digital signature to the prescription and re-submit the prescription to the Spine

The prescription message has failed structural validation at the Spine. A defect report should be raised against the local System or the Spine (whichever is in error). The prescriber must be notified accordingly to use a paper FP10 prescription.

display.value: Number of items on a prescription should be between 1 and 4

definition.value: The prescriber must be notified accordingly and asked to split the items across separate prescriptions.
The “repeatNumber” attribute exists at both the prescription and item level. An item cannot be authorised for more repeats than the prescription.

display.value: Repeat count should be between 1 and 99

definition.value: The maximum “high” value for the “repeatNumber” attribute is 99.
The System must create a new line item UUID and re-submit the prescription to the Spine.
The System must re-calculate / correct the check digit and re-submit the prescription to the Spine.

display.value: Format of date passed is invalid

definition.value: The format of a date/time attribute with the prescription does not confirm with the format defined within the DMS. The System must correct the date/time attribute and re-submit the prescription to the Spine.
Inform the dispenser to advise the patient that their prescription has been cancelled
Inform the dispenser that the prescription has expired and it cannot be downloaded
Inform the dispenser that the prescription has been downloaded by another dispenser. The rejection message will contain details of the dispensing site that has the prescription.
Inform the dispenser to advise the patient that this prescription has already been dispensed.
No further request messages to pull down nominated prescriptions should be submitted at this time

The Spine nomination functionality has been disabled at the request of the Authority and the message is rejected. The request will not be processed. However, the prescription request by prescription unique identifier should be available.

display.value: Prescription can not be found. Contact prescriber
Invalid State Transition for Prescription Item
Invalid Claim. Prescription is not Dispensed
Dispense Amendment/Cancellation Request does not pertain to Last Dispense
Claim amendment is not permitted outside of the claim period
